description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5h3v","text":"This protocol describes how to express and purify human SINTBAD tagged C-terminally with eGFP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"6v3dp","text":"Expression:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajdl9","text":"pFastBac_Dual_GST-TEV-SINTBAD-GFP (Addgene ID: 198035)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ent9b","text":"Sf9 insect cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hs6c","text":"SF921 medium with antibiotics 100 IU/ml Penicillin and 100 μg/ml Streptomycin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b03vl","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7je36","text":"Lysis Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aooag","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pu4j","text":"300 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbbbu","text":"2 mM MgCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvqca","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j4h5","text":"2 mM b-Met","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g04n","text":"Complete inhibitor EDTA free Roche","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1u90j","text":"50ul of Protease inhibitors Sf9 cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91q6s","text":"Benzonase (1ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21am7","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7b3l","text":"Wash I Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9k8","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH  8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bo74","text":"300 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e14l","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ui15","text":"1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c28","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cqmi","text":"Wash II Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l3ml","text":"50 mM Tris-HCl pH  8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btbrb","text":"700 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d3u0","text":"5% Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4qbh","text":"1 mM DTT
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jnio","text":"SEC Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a35od","text":"20 mM Tris-HCl pH  7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bogsh","text":"150 mM NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vmq2","text":"1 mM DTT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qcn0","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68kq0","text":"Columns/Resin:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mc32","text":"Glutathione Sepharose 4B (Cytiva)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjmoa","text":"Superdex 200 increase 10/300 column (Cytiva)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3l9dc","text":"To generate GST-TEV-SINTBAD-GFP construct the insect codon optimized SINTBAD gene was purchased from GenScript and cloned with respective tags into pFastBac_Dual. Generated construct was used for expression in Sf9 insect cells using the Bac-to-Bac system. The construct Addgene ID:  198035.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1q8i9","text":"Transfect 2.5 μg of bacmid DNA into Sf9 insect cells in a 6-well plate using FuGene transfection reagent (Promega). The bacmid DNA was amplified using DH10BacY cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8epfu","text":"About 6-7 days after transfection the V0 virus should be ready for harvesting. Use the V0 to produce a V1 virus stock by infecting 30 ml of Sf9 cells (1 million/ml). Collect V1 about 4-5 days later. Monitor viability of the cells and green fluorescence to decide when to collect V1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbvve","text":"Infect 1L culture of Sf9 cells at 1-1.5 million/ml cells/volume at 99-100% viability in log phase with 1 ml of Virus 1 (V1).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vh33","text":"After infection  monitor cells for viability and fluorescence. Harvest by centrifugation when the viability drops to 90–95% and clear green fluorescence is present. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qjbn","text":"To harvest spin down the cells at 2000 rpm, for 15 min at RT (Sorvall RC6+ centrifuge, Thermo Scientific). Gently wash the cell pellet with PBS, flash-freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at −80 °C until purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb72m","text":"Thaw a cell pellet corresponding to 1L culture by re-suspending it in 25 ml lysis buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300mM NaCl, 2 mM MgCl2, 5% glycerol, 2 mM β-Met, 1 μl Benzonase (Sigma), CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma), cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche)) and rolling or stirring in the cold room.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a7ut0","text":"Additionally disrupt the cells with a Dounce homogenizer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61k5u","text":"Clear the lysate by centrifugation (19 000 rpm for 45 min at 4°C in a Fiberlite F21-8x50y (Thermo Scientific)). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rrph","text":"Incubate the cleared supernatant with 2 ml of Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads slurry (Cytiva) for 2h at 4°C rolling gently. The GSH slurry should be washed with water and then with Wash I Buffer beforehand (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m7eb","text":"After 2h of incubation with the cleared lysate wash the beads two times with Wash I Buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 300 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT), once with Wash II buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 8.0, 700 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 1 mM DTT) and again twice with Was I Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mk2i","text":" Incubate the beads overnight with TEV protease at 4°C (20 ul of 10 mg/ml home-made TEV). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bcbj","text":"The next day spin down the beads (4000 rpm, 3 min, 4°C) and collect the supernatant containing cleaved SINTBAD-GFP. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49t64","text":"Filter the supernatant through a 0.45 μm syringe filter to remove any residual beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52eep","text":"Concentrate the protein down to 0.5 ml using a 30kDa cut-off Amicon filter and apply onto a Superdex 200 increase column (10/300, Cytiva) pre-equillibrated with a SEC buffer containing 20 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, and 1 mM DTT. Pool fractions containing pure proteins (see attached pdf), concentrate, snap freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at −80°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: SINTBAD-GFP: expression and purification
